item.title: UnionFind
item.description: UnionFind (Disjoint Set) # c++ class UnionFind { public: unordered_map<int, int> uf; int find(int a) { if(!uf.count(a)) uf[a] = a; if(uf[a] != a) uf[a] = find(uf[a]); return uf[a]; } void merge(int a, int b) { uf[find(b)] = find(a); } }; python class UnionFind: def __init__(self): self.uf = {} def union(self, a, b): roota = self.find(a) rootb = self.find(b) self.uf[rootb] = roota def find(self, a): if a not in self.uf: self.
